SELECT TMC.STORE_CD||'||'||TMC.CORNR_CD AS CORNR_CD , TMC.CORNR_CD AS CORNR_CD2 , TMC.CORNR_NM , NVL((SELECT STORE_CD FROM TB_MS_STORE WHERE STORE_CD = TMC.STORE_CD), TMC.STORE_CD) AS STORE_CD , NVL((SELECT STORE_NM FROM TB_MS_STORE WHERE STORE_CD = TMC.STORE_CD), TMC.STORE_CD) AS STORE_NM FROM TB_MS_CORNER TMC WHERE 1 = 1 AND EXISTS (SELECT * FROM TB_MS_STORE Z WHERE Z.STORE_CD = TMC.STORE_CD AND Z.HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd})
AND TMC.STORE_CD IN (${storeCdQuery})
AND TMC.STORE_CD||'||'||TMC.CORNR_CD IN
#{item}
ORDER BY TMC.STORE_CD||'||'||TMC.CORNR_CD
